title: The Stranger in Seat 8B
description: He has one rule on flights…No working in the air.And he's determined to make the ice queen abide by it.Annie is a workaholic. Her entire life revolves around being a successful lawyer, which means she has no time for anything or anyone else. And that includes engaging with handsome strangers that try to distract her from working.Damien knows the second he sits beside her that he's going to ignore the unspoken flight etiquette that says not to initiate small talk. He can’t help but to coax Annie out of her cold shell, one playful comment at a time.Can Damien convince Annie to take a chance on him, even if it's just for tonight? Or will she rebuild her walls and shut him out?Please note: The Stranger in Seat 8B is a standalone novella in the Just Tonight character series, featuring strong language and explicit sex scenes. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Nikki Castle
